topic: How to document REST APIs using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to document REST APIs using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Documenting REST APIs with FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to effectively document your REST APIs using FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.
key_points: Supports OpenAPI and JSON Schema specifications
Enables customizing document layouts with Markdown
Uses type hinting for auto-generating API docs
version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for using FastAPI.
FastAPI version 0.76.0 is used in this example.
caveats: Ensure type hints are accurate and consistent within your API for proper documentation generation.
Third-party libraries may be required to customize the appearance of your API's documentation.
